text: Baroi çahannam ʙisjore az çinnu insro ʙijofaridem. Onhoro didhoest, ki ʙa on namefahmand amri oxiratro va umedi savoʙ nadorand va az azoʙi Alloh nametarsand va onhoro caşmhoest, ki ʙa on cizero, ki foidaaşon ʙoşad, nameʙinand va gūşhoest, ki nameşunavand haqro, (ja'ne ma'no va fahmişi on dar dilhojaşon roh namejoʙad.) Inho monandi corpojonand, ki aql nadorand, hatto gumrohtar az onhojand. Zero corpojon naf' va zarari xudro dark menamojand. Inho xud az imoni ʙa Alloh va to'ataş dar ƣaflatand
